start.text: (It's a beautiful snowy day. You're on a walk when you hear rustling in the bushes beside you.)

duck_offscreen.text: *Huff puff* My oh my, all this snow sure makes it hard to walk around!

duck_greeting.text: Oh why hello there! Quite a snowy day today, isn't it?

duck_recognize.text: Quackems! Why wait a minute! I remember you! You're miss...buggems! Is that right?

duck_right.text: Ah yes! You're the kind young lady whose valentine I delivered last year! Do you remember my name?

duck_right_introduction.text: Why yes, that's me! {duckName}, at your service!

responses.label: nice to see you again {duckName}!

duck_wrong.text: Oh I'm so sorry, I must have forgotten. I know I've met you before. What was your name again miss?

duck_wrong_name.text: Ah that's right, how could I forget? Miss {userName}! So good to see you again! Do you remember my name?

duck_wrong_introduction.text: Yes! Your memory is much sharper than mine it seems. {duckName} at your service!

responses.label: nice to see you again {duckName}!

duck_special_day.text: I recall we met on a very special day last year. It seems like today is yet another special day! Do you know what day it is?
